entry.title: SessionBand Jazz Fusion
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼š$290.00 â†’ $90.00 [$90.00 ~ $290.00]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼š$90.00

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

SessionBand Jazz Fusion â€“ Tom Cawley Special Synth & Vintage Keys Edition Create studio-quality Jazz Fusion tracks to your own chords in minutes with this special artist edition of the award-winning SessionBand app - the worldâ€™s only chord-based loop app. With over 20,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops across 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles included, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great-sounding audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability. Perfect for songwriters and producers and the ultimate play-along for jazz rock and pop instrumentalists. Highly acclaimed, multi award-winning pianist Tom Cawley is one of the most sought-after keyboard players in the world both as a jazz pianist (Dave Weckl, Jack DeJohnette, Charlie Watts, Jamie Cullum, Guy Barker...), and as a leading pop/rock keyboardist, recording and performing around the world with U2, Peter Gabriel, Andrea Bocelli, Amy Winehouse and many others. For this special Jazz Fusion edition, Tom is joined by 2 of the world's top session musicians: Simon Lea â€“ Drums (Rod Stewart, Dionne Warwick, James Blunt, James Morrison, Katie Melua...) and Geoff Gascoyne â€“ Bass (Sting, Van Morrison, Georgie Fame...). Tom's passion for jazz and for modern and vintage keys is reflected in the diverse range of styles in this edition. And Tom has employed many of the best keyboards from his vast personal collection: from the Oberheim OB-6, Prophet 12 and Moog Model D (as well as a modular set-up), to his vintage Fender Rhodes, Wurlitzer and Hohner Pianet - they all feature in the content of this app. And to do full justice to this genre, we have increased the number of chord variations to 15 for every root note in all 15 styles! Alongside pro features like automated mixing, auto-transpose, one-touch live recording and a range of export functions, there are new tech features and upgrades like channel FX, instant PDF chord sheets and 'Track Builder' to make your track creation quicker and easier. Create professional Jazz Fusion to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create and share thousands of stunning royalty-free tracks. Hear the results. Watch the video at sessionbandapp.com The fastest way to create your own studio-quality music: â€¢ Pick one of 15 Jazz Fusion styles â€¢ Choose your chords â€¢ Stretch or shorten loops â€¢ Build up your track in minutes â€¢ Instantly hear your track across different styles and tempos â€¢ Auto-transpose your entire track â€¢ Add FX â€¢ Mix your track â€¢ Adjust track tempo â€¢ Record direct to audio â€¢ Copy straight to other music apps â€¢ Share with the world! The ultimate mobile jam/practice tool for musicians: â€¢ Practice with your own world-class band â€¢ Loop markers let you focus on specific sections â€¢ Mute instrument channels as you like â€¢ Produce PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create...instantly â€¢ 'Flip' your track across other styles and tempos â€¢ Transpose your whole track instantly You don't have to be a musician to create seriously good music and release it royalty-free! â€¢ Simple, intuitive interface â€¢ Audition the loop you are about to insert â€¢ â€˜Track Builderâ€™ allows simple creation of a full track â€¢ Intuitive mixing and record functions Detailed Product Information: â€¢ 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles: Acoustic Rock; 70s Funk; Pop Rock; Neo Soul; Psychedelic Soul; 70s Soul; Jazz Rock; Disco Funk; Neo Classical; Latin Fusion; Indie Pop; Electro Pop; Electro Jazz; DnB; Groovy Six Four â€¢ Tempos from 60bpm to 200bpm â€¢ 15 chord variations for every root note: maj; maj7; maj7(#11); 11; 7; 7(b9); 7(#9,#5); 7(#11); min; m(#5); m7(9); m(maj7); m7(b5); dim; maj â€˜stopâ€™ â€¢ 20 alternative drum grooves/drum fills in every style in addition to the main drum groove â€¢ The musical content in this app cannot be found in any of the other SessionBand apps â€¢ All loops are offered royalty-free and can be used freely in your own works

entry.title: SessionBand Jazz 4
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼š$150.00 â†’ $90.00 [$90.00 ~ $150.00]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼š$90.00

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Create professional quality jazz tracks to your own chords in minutes with this brand new edition of the award-winning SessionBand jazz app featuring exclusive, royalty-free, chord-based loops performed by 4 of the world's top jazz musicians: Jason Rebello (Piano); Jeremy Stacey (Drums); Patrick Clahar (Sax) and Geoff Gascoyne (Bass). Volume 4 is the ultimate jazz play-along and the perfect tool for jazz songwriters. And we have added loads of extra features and tech improvements since Volumes 1, 2 and 3. Here's what you get: 1. 15 chord variations per root note! From straight major and minors right through to the most exotic jazz chords 2. 20 alternative drum grooves/fills in each style 3. Free access to over 150 downloadable jazz standards ready to play along to in any key! 4. Instant PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create 5. New tech enhancements like 'Track Builder' to make the workflow even faster. With over 15,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops included in the download, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great sounding, royalty-free audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability. For this long-awaited edition, we have gone back to mostly classic jazz with a couple of contemporary styles. Among the classics, expect to hear medium, post-bop Wayne Shorter swing styles in four and three, plus Wes Montgomery and Ahmad Jamal-inspired up-tempo swing styles. There's a contemporary Brad Mehldau-type piano and string style in 5/4 and a wonderful carnival-like worldbeat Cuban number with many rich, melodic tenor sax loops to choose from. Create professional jazz tracks to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create, share and publish thousands of stunning royalty-free jazz tracks. Hear the results. The ultimate mobile jam/practice tool for musicians: â€¢ Practice with your own world-class quartet â€¢ Loop markers let you focus on specific sections â€¢ Mute instrument channels as you like â€¢ Produce PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create...instantly â€¢ 'Flip' your track across other styles and tempos â€¢ Transpose your whole track instantly â€¢ Download backing tracks for over 150 jazz standards for free (with chord sheets) ready to play. Transpose them with just one touch! åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness. The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Allianceâ€™s hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods. Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright. The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

This eye-care extension enables night mode by creating dark themes for websites on the fly. Dark Reader inverts bright colors, making web pages high contrast and easier to read at night. It perfectly suits system dark mode. The app includes multiple beautiful color themes. Choose between dark mode, colored, dimmed and screen shader themes, or create your own by tuning background and text colors. Enable or disable the extension for specific websites, auto-toggle based on system dark mode preferences, or activate dark theme detection to leave already dark websites untouched. Dark Reader's algorithms have been developed since 2014 by experts in the web development industry and evolve alongside modern web technologies to deliver fast and reliable dark mode support. Dark Reader doesn't show ads and doesn't collect any data. Before you install, disable similar extensions. Activate Dark Reader in Safari preferences. Enjoy browsing!
